languages.text: "Рады стараться, Ваша Светлость! У нас с еретиками разговор всецелокороткий!"

traits.locale_text: "Рады стараться, Ваша Светлость! У нас с еретиками разговор к-короткий".
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "It's a pleasure, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We make extremulously short work of heretics!"

languages.text: “这是我们的荣幸，大人！我们会在转眨之间就消灭那些异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "It's a pleasure, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We make extremulously short work of heretics!"

traits.locale_text: “这是我们的荣幸，大人！我们会在转眨之间就消灭那些异端分子！”
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: 「あ、ありがとうございます！陛下！異端者はすぐさま、始末します！」
languages.original_text: "It's a pleasure, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We make extremulously short work of heretics!"

traits.locale_text: 「あ、ありがとうございます！陛下！異端者はすぐさま、始末します！」
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: «¡Es un placer, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Hacemos un trabajo extremadamente corto con los herejes».
languages.original_text: "It's a pleasure, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We make extremulously short work of heretics!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es un placer, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Hacemos un trabajo extremadamente corto con los herejes».
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Ist mir ein Vergnügen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wir machen extremulös kurzen Prozess mit Ketzern!"
languages.original_text: "It's a pleasure, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We make extremulously short work of heretics!"

traits.locale_text: "Ist mir ein Vergnügen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" Wir machen extremulös kurzen Prozess mit Ketzern!"
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie ! Croyez-moi, avec nous, les hérétiques font pas long feu ! »
languages.original_text: "It's a pleasure, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We make extremulously short work of heretics!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie ! Croyez-moi, avec nous, les hérétiques font pas long feu ! »
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Lafı mı olur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Kâfirlerin icabına bir çırpıntıda bakarız!"
